location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'CORRECTIONS TO THE GAZETTEER OF PERSIA VOLUME II'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 12; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. Pagination: the file also contains an original printed pagination sequence.

mods.abstract: The volume consists of corrections to the Gazetteer of Persia Volume II(1st Series, 1917). It provides an index to the sub-tribes referred to in the volume.Printed at the Government Monotype Press, Simla, 1918.
